description: Under the constitution written by the mythical lawgiver Lycurgus, the institution of the Agoge was established, where Spartans were trained from the age of 6 to be superior warriors in defense of the Spartan state.
tooltip: Champion Hoplites are available in p1, and may promote to Olympic champions. They attack 10% faster and take 25% less train time than other spear champs but have -25 life, -1 of hack and peirce resistance and do 15% less dmg while costing 25% less wood and metal in p1
